Communicating complex systems, workflows, or project plans doesn’t have to involve a jumble of spreadsheets and countless emails. Whether you’re leading a team, presenting data to stakeholders, or aiming to clarify a project, Microsoft Visio Professional offers the visual tools you need to simplify the complicated. Right now, you can purchase a lifetime license for just $9.97 (Reg. $249.99).

items.title: All of the Mario 40th anniversary reveals: Mario Galaxy, Tennis Fever, new Yoshi game, and an actual Talking Flower
items.summary:
Nintendo’s big September Direct is a wrap and it certainly did not disappoint for Mario’s big 40th anniversary. The first Super Mario Bros. game released almost exactly 40 years ago and Nintendo unsheathed this year’s celebration with a host of key announcements in the form of upgraded versions of beloved Mario classics, a new Switch 2 Edition of one of the best 2D Mario games of the modern era, the official announcement of The Super Mario Galaxy Movie, a new Yoshi game, the new Mario Tennis experience, and a even a talking flower.

Pricing kicks off from $4.50 per pair, and with this bundle you’ll be able to hit the gym five times before needing to do laundry.

Clip the on-page 15% off coupon.

While I won’t argue that AirPods are some of the more feature-packed earbuds out there, I will say that they are quite pricey if you don’t think you need those features. I’ve personally opted for budget-friendly earbuds like these and it has allowed me to affordably have several pairs spread throughout the house. Despite the low price point here, you’re still getting a pair of ANC earbuds with “up to 55-hour battery life.”

If there’s an outlet in your home that you wish was somewhere else, this sort of power strip can really save the day. It features a wall cover plug that goes over top of a standard outlet to help disguise it. From there you can run the wall mountable power strip elsewhere. It offers a total of three AC outlets, two Type-C ports, and one USB-A, which is a nice upgrade from the standard outlet that you are replacing.
